summary: using console you can become a dremora.
descriptionHtml:
using console you can become a dremora all mighty with stats and spells that make almost invincible.

download and unzip, the paste to your skyrim directory.
in-game open console command (`) a
and write \"bat dremora\"
and watch the magic!

Stats:
player is lvl 89
no time between shouts
3000 health, magicka and stamina
1,000,000 carryweight
already have 1000 dragonsouls
all skills 100
all perks
all shouts
gives you azuras star, the black star
and a bunch of relevent spells and really strong daedric weapons and armor!

please if you have any ideas for a new batch file just give me a heads up and ill work on it.
Thanks! :)


Any problems? plz comment and ill try to help.
author: tdaviss
